biotools.summary: Tool that extracts accurate single nucleotide polymorphism genotypes at pre-defined loci from whole genome alignments and presents them in a standard genotyping format compatible with association analysis software and datasets genotyped on commercial array platforms.

bioschemas.name: ArrayMaker
bioschemas.summary: Tool that extracts accurate single nucleotide polymorphism genotypes at pre-defined loci from whole genome alignments and presents them in a standard genotyping format compatible with association analysis software and datasets genotyped on commercial array platforms.
